categories: Category:Classic Star Wars: The Early Adventures

nodes.text: Classic Star Wars: The Early Adventures 9
Classic Star Wars: The Early Adventures #9 was the ninth issue of the Classic Star Wars: The Early Adventures series.
This particular Classic series were reformatted and colored reprints of the Star Wars daily newspaper strip by Russ Manning.

Boba Fett makes his first appearance ever in this issue of Classic Star Wars: The Early Adventures! The galaxy's meanest bounty hunter made his debut in the Star Wars daily newspaper strips reprinted herein, featuring Luke and Han hunted on an icy tundra by the enigmatic masked man, Boba Fett!
